Blog.post: i hav a lot of holiday assignment to do! i m getting siao..... somemone help me!!! 2dae i m in a bad mood! 2nite i will be watching harry potter, it is cool!N i hav alot of june holidae assignments...... i do i until i siao...... sain leh! i still got IPW project to do, like sai!

yesterday nite i juz came back from china trip, it was quite a exciting one but the schedule,at there i knew 4 frens. N we r always 2gether as a group. we talk abot those interesting place n hobby abot each other. but yesterday the last dy , we were seperated , becoz we nid to go home..... sobsob! i miz them, but luckily i got the photo! but i m sick, i got cough, flu n alittle headache!!!

2dae is another fresh new day, gd morning to all those who r in blogger. i slept 12hrs yesterday nite..... i m fresh now, n 2dae, i will be listening to music n doing my hw n oso play com cnt 4get abot tt.......I tink i dun hav any cca in tis june holiday so i m free......yay!N my fren warm called me n she came my house n do sch holiday assignment.....n we hav a nice day.....

2dae i go out wif my parents to e chinese medical center, then after that we wnet to a nearby coffeeshop. Then we went to OG for tiolet then we ride MRT go home. N outside veri hot, i keep on sweating like mad! But after i came back i got 2 things tt i nid to do , play com n do my sch n tuition hw..... these r making me siao!!!! N tis few days i will nt be on Gunbound, tis is a report forthose who r playing gb!

2dae, is a fresh day again, in the morning when i wake up, i ate my breakfast. Then after tt i surf net then listen to song n do my hw. When i was packing my hw file i found out tt warm's maths paper is wif me, n then i noe tt she 4got to bring home ystdy!! i called her but no one ans the phone, so i sms faline to ask her if warm is at her house, but she says no n she says maybe she hasn't wake up! i m now veri anxious!!! i m going out..... ....bb! i went to my grandma's house then after abot 2 hrs, we wnet to yishun north point to catch a show called the the best bet n we oso hav our dinner over there..... the show is veri funnie which make me laugh.....hhehez then after that we went home happily.....

After i used my com, i go n do my maths tuition hw, but i do until i veri angry coz i dun no how to do the qs...... arghhhhh luckily my parents go out or else i will kena scolding from them again...... i hate maths... it is sux......WA LIAO!!! i really hate maths...........ARGHHHHHARGHHHHHARGHHHHHARGHHHHARGHHHARGHHHHARGHHHHARGHHH
aiya..... 2dae my mum's fren n her teacher r cuming to our house........
2dae 3.15pm to 5.15pm i got tution, then after tt i will go for wedding dine.......... hiya..... sian ..... i hope sch can reopen faster, nth to do at home veri the damn sian!
hiya..... 2dae got pw at 12.15pm... which i nid to go....so sian.... i hope i can escape but cnt, li en's house is so far... at bedok....
Erm.... 2dae i got 2tings to do b4 my couz cum, pack my rm n do maths.... they r cuming in the afternoon duno wad time..... n they r having their dine here.......

2dae at 11.30am i go out wif my nest fren mongtieng, to far east plaza..... at there we went to 77th street, pet shop, radioactive shop she bought 2 bags n 1 t-shirt..... then after tt we went to simei to c dogs n hamster, after tt i went to her house to play com then after tt i went home to hav dine wif my dad..... watch tv , bathe, play gb n later sleep maybe

ytdy i went to li-en's house to do pw, i do until abot 6 then cum back, then when i reach home it is already going to 7pm liao... then i watch tv until 10 then go n sleep becoz tml i nid to go out wif mongtieng......
2dae my best fren mongtieng went 4 band camp so i m nt going to play gb...... N 2dae my tution teacher is cuming at 4.45pm...... N later i m goignto do pw n play com.......... sian.....

YAY! tml my fren mong tieng is cuming back from band camp!!! N 2dae i went out wif my mum to her another sister's house at bukit ho swee...... then after tt we came back to rest n juz now i went out n bought dine .......later i my niece is cuming.....

2dae i m going out wif mongtieng to buy her cornet in tm.... we r going out in the noon after lunch...... N finally i went to her house until 6.20 then i went home.........

2dae morning i played computer, then after lunch i went to ws to meet warm and faline to do bk play then we went to downtown east to rest n eat....... then we came back at abot 5 sth then i went o tm to meet my mum to watch the show around the world in 80days .... it is a very interesting show...... i oso bought new pencil case n stationery ...... 2dae is my happy day.....
2dae i stay at home and play computer 4 the whole day..... 2 lazy to do any ting......hiya sian.....

2dae when i wake up my mood is quite gd..... lol duno y???-_- hiya... later then tel u more abot wad happen 2dae......erm.... 2dae actually my frens waned to cum but they cnt make it so the change it to sat..... actualy 2dae nth much happen lah, i was surfing my net n watching tv....

2dae i cleared my room 4 abot 4 hours ..... now my room is neat n tidy...... then after tt i watch friends on the com...... N oso caht wif ppl who is online n listen to songs..... N tml jenna, warm n faline will be cuming to my house to rehearse on the play for tis cuming wk book play

2dae i wake up at abot 9.20am n i started surfing my net , n later i nid to complete my tution hw, becoz i got tution tml morning..... hiya sian.... i hope can faster sch reopen..... at home really damn sian...... 2dae at abot 11 sth i went wen tout wif my parents to OG at the china town there to buy my father's working trousers n i went there to buy new umbrella becoz my old one had spoiled..... then later we went to orchid the OG to buy my sandlers n my private tings.......then we went to tm to hav dine n we went home.....

2dae i wake up at 9am, then later i hav tution at 10.30 n end at 12.30 pm but the teacher delayed until 1.10pm then release...... i went out 4 lunch wif my mum n at abot 2 sth i came back i started playing gb until 3.30pm wif chuan hui..... it is a nice game n i like playing wif him..... i got tuiton hw which tml afternoon i m going to complete it.... later my mum will be using the computer to update her tings....tml faline . warm n chuan hui maybe cuming to my house n practise 4 bkplay for tis cuming monday......

2dae is the 1st day of sch reopen after the june holidays..... 2dae when we go back to sch we got a new list of time table..... hiya.... every time like tis 1st semester change 3 times of timetable n now change again.... sian lah.... 2dae our stupid maths teacher go n add rules in our maths lesson....wa liao 5 big rules muz follow him.....sian.... then tt stupid assistant leader from high elves wa laio... keep on dist me.... sian... hiya tml nid to bring tie n tml got lit .... lit sux i hate it.... tt teacher like siao like tis keep on scolding us ..... like shit like tis sux!

wa liao 2dae damn unlucky....my maths teacher go n sabo me again... sian leh... tt stupid ziq go n draw a gal pic on the nt bk then cher saw it then later christopher go n say look like me wa liao then later my teacher go n say look like me..... siao...... wan..... n tml we got bk play rehearse again wtf.... it sux.......

2dae sc lesson me n warm switch to the right hand site of the classroom the last row at the corner.... we switch place wif luqman n shanizam they move to e front n mahmud n shafiq shif to the left hand site of the class room the 1st row.... then asyraf n ziq switch to where we sit last time.... behind gina n wang meng..... sian..... then at where we sit now tt stupid xiao bai lian ( chuan hui) keep on dist me n warm n we oso dist him.... tt christopher keep on saying warm jian women.... then chuan hui keep on laughing.....then warm n me keep on saying keep him bai lian the ghost ..... hahaha..... then almost the whole lesson we keep on laughing during sc period ...... me, chuan n warm...... so funny

2dae is quite a fun dae at sch......2dae during cme our teacher did not cum so another teacher cum in to relieve us....then we do the 1st chapter on the frens ship .... then on the 2nd pg we will nid to add who is our casual fren, close fren, n best fren...... then i got a lot casual frens... close fren k, best fren 6 ...... then i heard jenna n faline say tt idiot (ziq) go n put me in the best fren... then after sch... we went to faline house to do the bk play .... do until 6 sth then cum home yaya 2dae no hw!!! but tml got DNT... sux!

2dae.... hiaz..... sian.... 1st period read newspaper in class becoz raining.... ground wet... then 2nd to 3rd period pe... conduct by mr william ho..... quite fun.... n 2dae is ST John's day then after tt we hav 2 periods of bk play.... oso veri fun.... those show tt we act out r veri funny n cute...... then recess.... n 2dae is the 1st day tt we gals go 4 DNT.... the teacher mr tan quite nice n funni every time ask ppl to read...... intereating nt so much hw onli 2 pgs nt like our claz boyz say 30 pgs in 2 wks..... haha @dae is a interesting dae.... tml no guides yay

2dae is quite a crazy, 2dae morning, i wake up at 8 sth to go toilet then later i went back to sleep.... n later i wake up i m wif my bro becoz i dun wan to go to my grandma's house wif my parents.... so i stay at home surf net n do hw...... Then later at 11sth my bro go out liao i m alone at home so i go n play gb wif mongtieng until abot 12.10 like tis then i went out n buy lunch to eat then i on my com songs n start listening ...... n do my tuiton hw for tml...... hiya..... sian...... then later when my parents cum back..... i do my other tings n now i m charging hp.... waiting for it to ready becoz later i m going out to dine wif my miece n newphews at abot 7 sth.......

HAPPY YOUTH DAY TO EVERYONE!!! 2dae is quite a funny day at 10.30 am in the morning my tution teacher came n teach me sc the sc lesson is quite fun n funny then after tt the maths oso k lah.... then after tat i went to eat lunch n watch the tv until 4 sth then cum n use com...... chat wif mong n play gb.......... n listen to songs......

later at ten thirty i got tution until 12.30pm...... sian.... yesterday 2 tired to write blog becoz i 5 sth wake up juz for the drama practise.... the show start at 8 am sharp.... then end at 9 am then after tt got guides back woods man cooking until 2 then cum back..... sleep until 6 pm ........sian..... we did nt get in to the finals......2/2 2/5 win .... wa lao...... but cuming we tis group of ppl r going for IRP...... cnt wait......-_-
